name: Being Human
description:
Being Human is a visual novel where players follow Jay, an African-American non-binary high school student on their way to graduation. Jay and the player will face problems like microaggressions, race, and gender.  We hope that playing Being Human will teach people to be more empathetic. By following Jay, players get to experience a slice of what it may be like as a young African American non-binary youth in America.

Dev Team: David Green, Justin Walraven, Tanessa Howard
